thread.title: Comcast prepares to top Disney's $50 billion bid for Fox

title: Comcast prepares to top Disney's $50 billion bid for Fox
text:
Comcast prepares to top Disney's $50 billion bid for Fox 3:07am EDT - 01:22
Comcast confirmed for the first time on Wednesday it was preparing a higher, all-cash offer for the businesses that Twenty-First Century Fox has agreed to sell to Walt Disney. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
Comcast confirmed for the first time on Wednesday it was preparing a higher, all-cash offer for the businesses that Twenty-First Century Fox has agreed to sell to Walt Disney.
